item.title: Guide
item.description: Secure accounts Keeping your privacy by having secure accounts and doing minimal less is more on the Internet. def login(): username = "private_umbrella" password = "A6N?^QZ:fR?x;.$xhd^+r\\RyTj-lu" new_window = ctk.CTkToplevel(app) new_window.title("New Window") new_window.geometry("350x150") if user_entry.get() == username and user_pass.get() == password: tkmb.showinfo(title="Login Successful", message="You have logged in Successfully") ctk.CTkLabel(new_window, text="Keep your donuts private").pack() Follow these steps: Use a password manager. (eg.: KeyPass) Create unique and long passwords. (change your passwords now) Delete unneeded accounts - stay minimal.
item.content:
Secure accounts

Keeping your privacy by having secure accounts
and doing minimal less is more on the Internet.

def login(): 
    username = "private_umbrella" 
    password = "A6N?^QZ:fR?x;.$xhd^+r\\RyTj-lu" 
    new_window = ctk.CTkToplevel(app) 
  
    new_window.title("New Window") 
    new_window.geometry("350x150") 
      
    if user_entry.get() == username and user_pass.get() == password: 
        tkmb.showinfo(title="Login Successful", 
          message="You have logged in Successfully") 
        ctk.CTkLabel(new_window, 
                     text="Keep your donuts private").pack()

Follow these steps:

  1. Use a password manager. (eg.: KeyPass)
  2. Create unique and long passwords. (change your passwords now)
  3. Delete unneeded accounts - stay minimal.
  4. Consider using secure browsers aswell! (eg.: Firefox, Brave, Tor)

The next update will dive deeper into browsers.

item.title: private_Umbrella
item.description: Introduction Hello friend, The journey to find your own private umbrella begins now. Spectrum Consider where you want to be on the privacy spectrum. Do you want to be a normie and let companies know everything about you OR Do you want to be fully anonymous? Or maybe somewhere in between? This is how you will define your values of privacy.
item.content:
Introduction

Hello friend,

The journey to find your own private umbrella begins now.

Spectrum

Consider where you want to be on the privacy spectrum.

Do you want to be a normie and let companies know everything about you

OR

Do you want to be fully anonymous? Or maybe somewhere in between?

This is how you will define your values of privacy.
